meanings.sent1: I am gratefuller for your help than words can express.
meanings.sent2: She is always gratefuller for the little things in life.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed gratefuller than usual after getting a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden looked gratefuller after the rain.
meanings.sent5: His smile was gratefuller than a sunny day after the storm.

meanings.definition: More grateful than someone or something else
meanings.sent1: Out of all the students, she was the gratefuller one for the opportunity.
meanings.sent2: He felt gratefuller than his friend for the unexpected gift.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed gratefuller than the cat for the extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The old tree appeared gratefuller than the young sapling for the rain.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes were gratefuller than the star-filled sky.
